Name: Toy - Bubble Stick
Description:
After using the prop, the normal attack button is replaced with the bubble blowing button.
Click the button to start blowing bubbles, and click the button again to stop. Click the exit toy button to restore the normal attack button.
Description$english:
After using the prop, the normal attack button is replaced with the bubble blowing button.
Click the button to start blowing bubbles, and click the button again to stop. Click the exit toy button to restore the normal attack button.
